Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
dialogs_chapter_10_И так, пока мои време:
So, while my temporary friends are having fun outside,
it's time to do what I got myself into all this for.
dialogs_chapter_10_Прости владыка Адаман:
Forgive me, Lord Adamant, I will absorb you to the roots.
No offense, nothing personal, just a business interest in energy.
dialogs_chapter_10_Восставший! У нас про:
The Risen! We have penetration! Don't let him near the 
core!
dialogs_chapter_10_Ага, значит оно здесь:
Aha, so it's here. Thanks for the tip! Don't you want to leave\..\..\..
the easy way?
dialogs_chapter_10_*тяжело вздыхает* А в:
*sighs heavily* But I wouldn't want to cut you out\..\..\..
it would be awkward in front of Irei.
dialogs_chapter_10_(Ладно. Постараюсь не:
(Okay. I'll try not to hurt the brain or heart. Well, and without
beheadings.)
It's been a long time since we've seen each other\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_10_Ага, пару сотен лет н: Yeah, a couple of hundred years ago, but it feels like yesterday.
dialogs_chapter_10_Он самый. Только что: He is the one. Just what is he doing here?
dialogs_chapter_10_Прогуливался. Дышал ч:
I was taking a walk. I was breathing the clean milit air
of Purgatory and somehow my feet carried me to the very center.
dialogs_chapter_10_Я пришёл сюда поглоти:
I came here to absorb Adamant completely, thereby depriving it 
of "life".
dialogs_chapter_10_Что?\\..\\.. Разве он:
What?\..\.. Isn't he your master? Then\..\..\.. Why did you
join them and fight against us?
dialogs_chapter_10_Чтобы доверие заслужи:
To earn their trust. They trust me so much that
they are ready to believe any nonsense I say.
dialogs_chapter_10_А когда твои дружки у:
And when your friends, Krieger and Claudius, find out, how will 
you explain your actions to them?
dialogs_chapter_10_Они не доживут до это:
They won't live to see that moment. Just let me near the core
and you'll see for yourself.
dialogs_chapter_10_Не надейся. Фолтер, т:
Don't get your hopes up. Folter, you've always had your own 
mind and haven't changed in thousands of years. Anything can 
be expected from you.
dialogs_chapter_10_Я никогда не поверю в: I'll never believe in your good intentions.
dialogs_chapter_10_Они никогда не были б:
They were never good, rather personal and useful
only to me\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_10_Что ж, как и раньше,: Well, as before, if you dig in your heels - you'll never be convinced.
dialogs_chapter_10_Вам придется поверить: You'll have to believe me. Even if I have to convince you by force.
dialogs_chapter_10_Прошлый раз мы вышли: Last time we reached a draw.
dialogs_chapter_10_Да уж, задачка немног:
Well, the task has become a bit more complicated. And what is 
the name of your new friend?
dialogs_chapter_10_Что, Зед, неудобно ак:
What, Zed, is it inconvenient to activate the release form 
underground, next to a ton of potential explosives?!
dialogs_chapter_10_Гад\\..\\..\\.. Если:
Bastard\..\..\.. If you destroy Purgatory\..\..\.. The world will be even 
closer to death.
dialogs_chapter_10_Да он и так мертвый,: It's already dead, how much worse could it be?
dialogs_chapter_10_Фолтер раскинул руки,: Folter spread his arms, as if preparing for a hug.
dialogs_chapter_10_Если бы я хотел всех: If I wanted to kill you all, I would have done it\..\..\.. a second ago.
dialogs_chapter_10_Уххх, такая мощь, гре: Uhhh, such power, it would be a sin not to use it.
dialogs_chapter_10_Если ты и правда хоче: If you really want to\..\..\.. atone for your sins, call off the Risen..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_10_Нет, сами разбирайтес: No, sort it out yourselves. Farewell, gentlemen!
dialogs_chapter_10_Где-то на подступах к: Somewhere on the outskirts of the Dark Forest.
dialogs_chapter_10_Фолтер достал некое у: Folter took out a certain device.
dialogs_chapter_10_Прощайте и вы, Восста:
Farewell to you, Risen. You have been deceived by everyone. 
Your God, your leader and your entire business, one continuous 
deception.
dialogs_chapter_10_Устройство деактивиро:
The device deactivated the portal through which the adamantine
reapers teleported to Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_10_Следом взорвалось ору:
Then the weapon exploded, with which the servants of Adamant
broke through the barrier.
dialogs_chapter_10_Вероломгер Сидрин, их:
Werolomger Sidrin, there are not many of them left, a couple more 
districts.
dialogs_chapter_10_Хорошо, я проверю цен: Okay, I'll check the central district.
dialogs_chapter_10_Друг мой, давно не ви:
My friend, it's been a long time since we last met. Do you still 
recognize me?
dialogs_chapter_10_Как всегда молчишь. А:
You're silent as always. Adamant has apparently burned out 
your entire mind.
dialogs_chapter_10_Скажи, каков мир тепе: Tell me, what is the world like in your eyes now?
dialogs_chapter_10_Прекрасен. Я вижу всё: Beautiful. I see everything as it is.
dialogs_chapter_10_За что ты ненавидишь:
Why do you hate Purgatory? You used to be the most 
benevolent reaper I've ever known\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_10_Вы жалкие марионетки,:
You are pathetic puppets, blindly obeying the will of Death,
like us.
dialogs_chapter_10_Хех\\..\\..\\.. Прежн: Heh\..\..\.. The old you would never have said such a thing.
dialogs_chapter_10_Прежний я был слеп. Я:
The old me was blind. The rage that Adamant feels, I feel it too. 
His thoughts are my thoughts, his desires are my desires.
dialogs_chapter_10_Смерть создала нас, ч:
Death created us to cover herself with, like a shield. While she
restores herself, we perish and are reborn. While we
perish, the Abyss will fill to the brim faster.
dialogs_chapter_10_Настанет день и мы бо:
The day will come when we will no longer be needed by our 
masters. The Creators will turn away from their creations, 
the world will plunge into self-destruction and nothing will 
remain. Only darkness.
I'm ready to meet it. And you?
dialogs_chapter_10_С тех пор, как стал В: Since I became the High Reaper.
dialogs_chapter_10_Прощай, Клавдий. Я уп:
Farewell, Claudius. I will put your soul to rest as quickly as 
I can.
dialogs_chapter_10_Удар у тебя как всегд: Your blow was\..\..\.. as heavy as always.
dialogs_chapter_10_Вероломгер успел прим: Werolomger managed to use a healing ingot.
dialogs_chapter_10_Лаурита, на связи Сид:
Laurita, Sidrin on the line. I defeated Claudius. How are you 
doing with the others?
dialogs_chapter_10_Нормально. Остатки по: Fine. The rest are almost finished off.
dialogs_chapter_10_Вот и всё. Благодаря:
That's it. Thanks to one traitor, our entire campaign
turned into a failure. We did some damage and didn't achieve 
our goal.
dialogs_chapter_10_Этого ты хотел, влады: Is this what you wanted, lord?
dialogs_chapter_10_Я убил многих за обе: I have killed many in both wars\..\..\.. Reapers of all ranks.
dialogs_chapter_10_Я задам тебе такой же: I will ask you the same question.
dialogs_chapter_10_Ради чего ты забрал е:
For what reason did you take the only ray of light in my
fucking life?
dialogs_chapter_10_Доволен итогом?: Are you happy with the outcome?
dialogs_chapter_10_Я верил, чувствовал,:
I believed, I felt that Adamant's will was leading us to a higher 
goal.
dialogs_chapter_10_Что мы заберем энерги:
That we will take Adamant's energy, divide it between 
ourselves and build our fortress, and then we can form an 
alliance with the reapers.
dialogs_chapter_10_Что?\\..\\.. Мир? Пос: What?\..\.. Peace? After everything you have done.
dialogs_chapter_10_Кригер. Вы проиграли: Krieger. You lost and died when you started this war.
dialogs_chapter_10_Фолтер уже сделал сво:
Folter has already done his job, your subordinates have 
been exterminated, Claudius is already resting behind 
the walls\..\..\.. You are the last one.
dialogs_chapter_10_Что ж\\..\\..\\.. тог:
Well\..\..\.. then there is no point in holding back any longer. 
When I finish you off, I will definitely catch up with this rat 
and take Adamant's energy for myself.
dialogs_chapter_10_Всё сказал?\\..\\.. П: Have you said everything?\..\.. Before dying.
dialogs_chapter_10_Ради мести. Адамант х:
For the sake of revenge. Adamant wanted to destroy 
Purgatory, but he didn't have "the hands" to do it.
dialogs_chapter_10_Мне жаль тебя. Ты сле:
I pity you. You blindly believed in what you were doing and
you paid for it.
dialogs_chapter_10_Если бы ты был умнее,:
If you were smarter, obeyed your will and weren't Adamant's 
puppet\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_10_Мы бы могли решить вс:
We could solve all the problems without war. I'm sure 
that the Werolomgers' headquarters would listen to you. 
You would find another way, but it's too late.
dialogs_chapter_10_Ты последний из Восст: You are the last of the Risen, this war will end with you.
dialogs_chapter_10_Вот как. Ты и правда: I see. You really are an unusual reaper. Smarter than the rest.
dialogs_chapter_10_Прав ты только в одно: You are right only in one thing - it will end with me.
dialogs_chapter_10_Хорошо\\..\\..\\.. По:
Okay\..\..\.. It's time to use my trump card. Forgive me, lord, I
will use all my remaining energy.
dialogs_chapter_10_Кригер поднял в небо: Krieger raised his fist to the sky.
dialogs_chapter_10_Тело Риома изрубленно:
Riom's body is hacked from his face to his feet. Almost 
all of his bones are broken. There are open fractures on 
his arms and legs. Only the power of the Genome keeps 
the blood from flowing from all of the wounds.
dialogs_chapter_10_Кригер не в лучшем ви:
Krieger is not in the best shape. His armor is so badly 
shattered that you can see the remains of his insides 
covered in adamantine crystals.
dialogs_chapter_10_От его тела осталось:
All that was left of his body was a quarter of his torso 
with his heart and a piece of his head with his brain, 
the rest were prostheses made of pyrite.
dialogs_chapter_10_Ты\\..\\..\\.. мелкий: You\..\..\.. little bastard\..\..\.. won't stop me\..\..\.. I'll\..\..\.. in any case.
dialogs_chapter_10_Я в любом случае\\..\: I'll\..\..\.. take you with me anyway.
dialogs_chapter_10_Прошу, не убивайте! Я: Please, don't kill me! I'm weak and can't do much...
dialogs_chapter_10_С последним не соглас:
I don't agree with the last one, you can help me get to the 
main core.
dialogs_chapter_10_Я не убью тебя, пока:
I won't kill you, not yet. But in exchange, you'll come 
with me and just try to escape, you'll get a blade in 
the back of your head in no time.
dialogs_chapter_10_Как решить эту голово: How do I solve this puzzle?
dialogs_chapter_10_Тини, помоги-ка. Как: Tiny, help me. How do I solve this puzzle?
dialogs_chapter_10_Ем… Сейчас мы в ловуш:
Em... Now we are in Irei's trap. Among ourselves we 
call it "the safe". To get out, we need to go through 
4 cycles in the correct sequence.
dialogs_chapter_10_У Ирея все всегда иде:
For Irei, everything always goes clockwise. The 
first cycle is the same - "clock", left, up, right, 
down and back to the original.
dialogs_chapter_10_Второй - “Бесконечнос:
The second one is “Infinity”. You need to start on 
the right side and move along the arc. As if you 
were drawing the infinity sign on paper.
dialogs_chapter_10_Третий - “Змея-патрул:
The third one is "Snake Patrol". Also move to the right, 
then up to the bottom, left, up and in reverse order to 
the starting position.
dialogs_chapter_10_Четвертый - самый про:
The fourth is the easiest. You need to make one circle 
to the left side, and go straight down through the center.
dialogs_chapter_10_Ирей, что б тебя… Люб:
Irey, damn you... You love to torment your enemies with 
your riddles.
dialogs_chapter_10_Фолтер положил руку н:
Folter put his hand on Tiny's shoulder and put the 
cleaver to the reaper's throat.
dialogs_chapter_10_У меня не так много в: I don't have much time and it could cost you your life.
dialogs_chapter_10_Так что, изволь показ:
So, please show me the easier option. You
should have it!
dialogs_chapter_10_Д-да, конечно, вот сх: Y-yes, of course, here are the correct route maps.
dialogs_chapter_10_Фолтер получил код от: Folter got the code to "Irey's safe".
That would have been right away.
dialogs_chapter_10_А вот и нарушитель… с: And here's the intruder... with two traitors.
dialogs_chapter_10_Подождите! Я не с ним: Wait! I'm not with him! He held me hostage.
dialogs_chapter_10_Я тоже! Прости, Фолте:
Me too! Sorry, Folter, but we've gone too far.
I can't go against my own. Now we have our main 
bodyguard with us and the chances of winning are even.
dialogs_chapter_10_Рад слышать. Атакуем: Glad to hear it. Let's all attack together!
dialogs_chapter_10_Что ж, господа, вам ж: Well, gentlemen, it's too bad for you.
dialogs_chapter_10_Фолтер перерезает гор:
Folter slits the throat of the main bodyguard. He
loses consciousness from the wounds he received.
dialogs_chapter_10_Ой-ей… Что такое? Бол:
Oh-oh... What's wrong? The big reaper uncle has 
fallen and you want to fight him?
dialogs_chapter_10_Я так понял тут выклю:
I understand that there is a switch for some kind of 
barrier here. Right?
dialogs_chapter_10_Барьер. Перед дверью: Barrier. In front of the door to the room with the core.
dialogs_chapter_10_Тогда не мешайте. Ещё:
Then don't interfere. If you attack me again, I'll chop 
you into mincemeat!
dialogs_chapter_10_Не угадал, Фолтер, од:
You guessed wrong, Folter, one of the leaders of the Risens.
Former leaders.
dialogs_chapter_10_Бывших?.. Ты перешёл: Former?.. Have you gone over to the reapers' side?
dialogs_chapter_10_Слушай, ты не мог бы:
Listen, could you help me get to the control room? 
Open the door, for example?
dialogs_chapter_10_А после ты оставишь м: And then you'll leave me alone? I won't risk attacking you...
dialogs_chapter_10_Пожалуй, нет. Ты пойд:
I guess not. You'll come with me and help me overcome 
obstacles.
dialogs_chapter_10_Как только я получу д:
As soon as I gain access to the core of Purgatory, you're 
free.
dialogs_chapter_10_И зачем тебе это? Хоч:
And why do you need this? Do you want to send all of 
Purgatory into the air?
dialogs_chapter_10_Нет, дурень. Я сюда н:
No, you fool. I didn't come here to commit suicide! 
I'm interested in the rest of Adamant's energy. 
I'll take it and sneak away from here... and from 
my people.
dialogs_chapter_10_В любом случае у тебя:
Either way, you have no choice, so open the door and 
come with me.
